R is a really great language for statistics and data. `ggplot2` is a great package for pretty graphics.
```{r, eval=TRUE}
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r, fig.cap="Plotting data with a regression line with ggplot"}
qplot(x=speed,y=dist,data=cars) + geom_smooth(method="lm")
```
